page.title: 16LEISURE ACTIIVITIES
page.content: I am finding out about{leisure {actiivities.}Most people like to watch television,especially in the winter, and in this area we can receive B.B.C.1 and 2 and B.B.C. East and I.T.V. Thames,and Channel 4.All the children like playing outside and I like gardening. There are cub packs, Brownies,Guides and Scouts but we have to go to the next village to meet. There is a playing field in Ford End with swings and goal posts and a cricket field where the team plays at weekends.People can fish in the rivers and reservoirs but you shoud have a licence. There is a village hall in Ford End where there are discos and sometimes concerts. The pubs have dart teams and they have matches against other teams.
